qas.question: In November 2008, who was on death penalty without a murder conviction?
In what state was Gloria Ann Wilbur murdered?
In what year was Demarcus Sears convicted of kidnapping?
A jury in what state sentenced Demarcus Sears to death?
In November 2018, who was on death penalty without a murder conviction?
Who did Demarcus Sears let go free?
In what state was Gloria Ann Wilbur born?
In what year was Demarcus Sears freed of kidnapping?
A jury in what state sentenced Demarcus Sears to freedom?

context: As of November 2008, there is only one person on death row facing capital punishment who has not been convicted of murder. <a0_0><b5_0>Demarcus Sears<b5_0/><a0_0/> remains under a death sentence in Georgia for the crime of "kidnapping with bodily injury." Sears was convicted in <a3_0><b8_0>1986<b8_0/><a3_0/> for the kidnapping and bodily injury of victim <a1_0><b6_0>Gloria Ann Wilbur<b6_0/><a1_0/>. Wilbur was kidnapped and beaten in Georgia, raped in Tennessee, and murdered in <a2_0><b7_0>Kentucky<b7_0/><a2_0/>. Sears was never charged with the murder of Wilbur in Kentucky, but was sentenced to death by a jury in <a4_0><b9_0>Georgia<b9_0/><a4_0/> for "kidnapping with bodily injury."
